reviewText: If you haven't ever been to a National Poetry Slam (NPS), this great DVD makes a wonderful introduction to what a Finals Night can be! See poets performing solo, in duos, trios and even four person group pieces, all in front of a raucous, cheering audience!
2004 was an ELECTION YEAR, and you can see it all over the FIERY and POLITICAL work performed on this DVD! Group piece and solo work abound!!
